data.message: When I try to click on marketplace it keeps telling me in blocked what caused that?

replies.message: Hi Teresa. It's possible that your account was blocked due to member feedback our team received. Keep in mind that blocks are temporary and can last a few hours or a few days and that we can't lift this block for any reason. -Jessica
Fwhen I get something  I don 't want on my page how do I get it off
Hi Marion. When you delete a post, you'll permanently remove it from your Page, including your Page's activity log. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2o4fF4M. -Brittany
Is there a way to find out how long it's for?

I was recently in Hawaii on vacation. While there I used a computer on the cruise ship. When I returned home, I experienced a problem. When I click on Buy and Sell Groups under Explore on the left side of the screen, I get groups from Hawaii ... not Pasadena, Tx where I live. Can this be corrected? I have posted several times on Facebook with no response.
Hey Mike. You can learn how to edit the location and distance for items you want to buy in marketplace here: http://bit.ly/2o4O3MZ. -Joe
Facebook When I click on Buy and Sell Groups under Explore, it shows  a map and groups in Hawaii.  I don't live in Hawaii!!!!!
This has happened to others.  What is the problem?
Did you sell any animals or animal products?

Dear facebook team

Today when I login to my account, for verification they asked passport or birth certificate etc for verification, when I uploaded my exam roll number slip, now my account is blocked and when I search from friend account it shows content not available.

please open my account.

Thanks
